mapper.select: SELECT s.sName, s.price, d.dAmount, d.CONDITION, TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'MM') AS mdate, TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'YYYY') AS ydate FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN STOCK st on d.SSERIALNUMBER = st.SSERIALNUMBER INNER JOIN SubClass s ON st.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'YYYY') = #{ydate}

SELECT s.sName, s.price, u.UAMOUNT, u.CONDITION, TO_CHAR(u.UDATE, 'MM') AS mdate, TO_CHAR(u.UDATE, 'YYYY') AS ydate FROM USES u INNER JOIN STOCK st on u.SSERIALNUMBER = st.SSERIALNUMBER INNER JOIN SubClass s ON st.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(u.UDATE, 'YYYY') = #{ydate}

SELECT s.sName, sum(d.dAmount*s.price) As dAmount FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN STOCK st on d.SSERIALNUMBER = st.SSERIALNUMBER INNER JOIN SubClass s ON st.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber GROUP BY s.sName
